name: Cold Start
description: Your car breaks while driving home in the middle of the forest. Unfortunately, it is cold out there, which means you have to warm yourself as well as protect yourself from hostile creatures. To start the car, you need to find 3 details scattered around the map. You will probably find some hints to find them easier. Luckily, this is nature, which means supply of fuel and food, and you also have your trusty axe, which can help you.
